channel.title: Help making a .java file
channel.description:
I can't figure this out When in my compiler, I get this error: [code]Worldmap.java:8: class Worldmap is public, should be declared in a file named Worldmap.java public class Worldmap { ^ 1 error.[/code]
But I have declared that it is a public class in the file worldmap.java what is it trying to tell me when i have already done what it asked?
DELTA 317

item.title: Help making a .java file
item.dc:creator: @Dragon99999 Dragon99999
item.description:
@Dragon99999 wrote:

Fixed, changed it to WorldMap.java

Thanks Vain!!

Read full topic
